title: Game not launching resulting in low priority queue
body:
After managing to get into a game after low priority queue bug on me 4 times in a row,

Found a game it goes in champ select and everything is alright until the countdown is running. When it reaches 0 and the game is supposed to launch. Nothing happen and I'm just looking at champ select for 5 mins with the countdown timer at 0 hoping for a miracle. I'm most likely getting a dodger penality there again.

Seriously why the hell do I even bother with this. Just roll back to the old client and say that you screwed up everything.

replies.body:
If you're freezing for over 5 minutes on champ select after everyone else has entered the game, there's a pretty good chance that your network wasn't able to bridge your connection from the client lobby into the actual game server you were going to play on. 

You should be able to get a smoother transition into the game by adjusting some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but hit us back up if you don't see too much of a difference.
